activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11692
activity.text:
Hi @sunidhisachan can you please assign me this issue i can solve this 
SOLUTION :  1 . modify the registration form so that the state input comes before the pincode for validation
2. Frontend Validation: Using an NPM package to verify the pincode against the state in real-time.
3. Backend Validation: Ensure that the backend also checks if the pincode belongs to the state before saving patient details.
4. at last error handling 

END DATE : 5th april
